body.name: PURE BEDDING Bed Sheets - Queen Sheet Set [6-Piece, Purple] - Hotel Luxury 1800 Brushed Microfiber - Soft and Breathable - Deep Pocket Fitted Sheet, Flat Sheet, Pillow Cases
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ✅ Luxurious Hotel Style Bedding - Live the life of luxury with our lustrous smooth sateen weave bedding. Ideal for any room in your house. Offers the comforts of a hotel bed without the hefty fees!
✅ Premium Microfiber, Superior Quality - Our beddings are woven from premium microfiber, double brushed on both sides for maximum softness. Twice as fine as silk and softer than Egyptian cotton!
✅ Lightweight & Breathable - The fabric is distinctively strong yet lightweight and breathable. Keeps you cool in the summer and warm in the winter! Feel refreshed with our relaxing bedding.
✅ Comfort & Beauty - We provide luxury that you can both see and feel. Our bedroom set includes pillowcases with envelope flaps closure to hide the pillow. Comes in vibrant colors!

✅ Easy Care - Taking the proper garment care of your pillowcase and sheets is essential if you like to preserve their durability. Machine washable, gentle cycle in cold water and dry on low heat. Do not bleach.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Ultimate Pleasure of Sleeping Enjoy Your Bed Time Like Never Before Cozy up to home linens everyone in your family will love. We’re always dreaming up new ways to help you sleep well and get that extra bit of comfort throughout the day, all made for the way you live, priced for your budget, and delivered directly to you with a smile.

Fall in Love with Very Fabric of It - Pet Friendly Some studies advise that sleeping without pets in your bed is better for restful sleep, but who can resist those endearing puppy eyes? The fact is, pets do spend a lot of time on your bed and you don't want to worry about them ruining your bedding! Pure Bedding is pet friendly, so you don't need to worry about pet nails or claws! It's less likely to tear or snag, even when you share your bed with your pets. So go ahead, build a pillow fort and snuggle inside with your best friend! Your pets will be overjoyed to cuddle with you and you'll be thrilled that your beautiful bedding won't be harmed by your playful pets! In addition, pet hair, fur and dander will not cling to the material and can easily be removed by brush, vacuum or machine washing. Durable and silky soft, our dreamy bedding will create an unforgettable sleeping experience!

Pure Bedding Hotel Luxury Microfiber Bed Sheet Set or Microfiber Pillowcase Set - Heavenly Sleeping Experience Every touch makes the body love. Whether it is the gloss of the surface or the natural smoothness of the fabric, it shows a high-grade and exquisite quality. Pure Bedding Microfiber Sheets provides ultimate soft with premium microfiber fabric. Shield a protective layer in order to wash and last longer than silk bed sheets from season to season. Save your precious time in maximum by quick-drying feature with friendly easy care. Envelope pillow cases with paired design add more enchanting feeling with an exquisite workmanship, bright fabrics, classic colors. Our bed sheets will give your bed an elegant look.

Soft and Smooth Microfiber Fabric Our classic ultra soft bed sheet set is designed with your comfort in mind. Made of finest brushed 100% premium microfiber yarns, this set creates a new standard in softness that makes it really hard to get out of bed in the morning. Envelop Closure Design Microfiber pillowcase adopts exquisite widening process, fine stitches, firm and durable, smooth routing, beautiful and practical. No zipper envelope closure end design to offer you easy on and off pleasant user experience. Secure Your Mattress The fitted sheets have elastic all the way around the sheet to keep the sheet in place. At each corner to secure the sheet in proper place to your mattress.

We Know What’s Look Great in Bed Get a New Flavor of Bed Everyday - Available in Different of Colors and Sizes Choose from our selection of vibrant, beautiful colors to find the perfect shade that will update your bedroom and give it a fresh, new look. Upgrading your bedroom décor has never been so easy and affordable! TWIN 3 or 4 PIECE MICROFIBER BED SHEET SET: Flat sheet: 69” x 102”. Fitted sheet: 39” x 75” x 14”. Pillowcase (1 or 2): 20” x 30” TWIN XL 3 or 4 PIECE MICROFIBER BED SHEET SET: Flat sheet: 66” x 102”. Fitted sheet: 39” x 80” x 14”. Pillowcase (1 or 2): 20” x 30” FULL 4 or 6 PIECE MICROFIBER BED SHEET SET: Flat sheet: 84” x 97”. Fitted sheet: 54” x 75” x 14”. Pillowcases (2 or 4): 20” x 30” KING 4 or 6 PIECE MICROFIBER BED SHEET SET: Flat sheet: 108” x 102”. Fitted sheet: 78” x 80” x 14”. Sleep Well, Live Better Bedsheet For a Better World With decades of experience in the home industry, PURE BEDDING's top priority is bringing quality to our consumers, we have been bringing the best of European-style comfort into discerning homes across the United States. At Pure Bedding, we are pleased to welcome you to our selection of beautiful luxuries for the 100% microfiber or cotton bed sheets set, satin sheets, jersey sheets, pillowcases, shams, duvet covers, quilt comforter set, weighted blanket and more to your bed, bath and home. Exceptional materials and outstanding craftsmanship have made our name synonymous with fine bedding the world around. Amazing Product + Better Experience + Personal Touch + Efficient Supply Chain = Our Promise to You!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and soft
reviews.reviewText: They are decent quality. I've washed them twice now and still holding strong. I bought the Grey ones about 2 months before the purple and they are strong and been thru numerous washes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softness you can really feel!
reviews.reviewText: No dislikes at all. I love love the softness and quality of the sheets. Well priced and I have recommended to friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You get what you ask for and the price was great.
reviews.reviewText: Just as I ordered and was as described. Soft and wrinkle free. Use it on my personal bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality is quite good however the comforter is thin but still keeps you warm. The sheers are some abd smooth and not itchy against the skin. The set also doesn't have a bad smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These sheets are very nice and high quality. The pillow cases for the king size are huge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Back for more!
reviews.reviewText: Love this set. Soft and fits my queen sized bed perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these sheets!
reviews.reviewText: This is our second set of these sheets. We have king and queen now. This purple color is beautiful and we love that the fitted sheet is deep for our mattresses! These wash very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft but doesn't fit well
reviews.reviewText: These are very soft sheets and a beautiful purple. But there has not been a night we've slept on these sheets where the fitted sheet stays on the bed. All 4 corners of the fitted queen sheet do not fit to the corners of my queen bed.
Great sheet set, fits perfectly and has a bit more depth so it’s doesn’t pop off as easily as some
Worth the price, very soft sheets and love the colours
Soft and wrinkled free, true color
Like these sheets so I bought a second set.
